How to play with your friend
Can Hans Niemann really fit that buttplug?

"A new report delivered from the University of Montana reveals that mr Niemanns victory against the reigning champion Magnus Carlsen might not be cheating after all. Niemanns anus-circumference is estimated to be too small after an operation back in 2015 to fit such a communication object. "
"Magnus Carlsen was asked to review downfall of Runescape 3 and had no comment what so ever. Don't click here please "
